nodes.text: The Second Battle of Excarga was an attempt by the Galactic Republic to take back the ore-rich planet of Excarga.

The planet had been won by the CIS during the First Battle of Excarga, and the Republic sent a force to the world to reclaim it, as well as rescue the prisoners taken by the CIS during the first battle.
The Republic defeated the Confederacy's forces, and were largely successful in freeing the prisoners, though several were not found.

Most of those that were orphaned by the CIS invasion and the following imprisonment of the planet's citizens were taken to a temporary homestead on Bespin. One of these orphans named Garr soon became Boba Fett's only friend.
